Text: What codec do I need to play it in Windows Media Player? The video opens as an audio file, I want to view the video!

Video and audio are in separate files. they both play with windows media player.

My question is how do I included the music to the video to listen to both at the same time.
The video plays with no sound and the audio plays with no video.
How do I put both together.
Can anyone help me.

You need AC3 Filter codec installed if you want to have audio from the music video.

http://www.ac3filter.net/projects/ac3filter/releases
